MainCourse.alt: A plate of classic Italian pasta with tomato basil sauce and parmesan
MainCourse.name: Pasta Perfection
MainCourse.description: Handcrafted pasta tossed in a flavorful tomato basil sauce with a touch of garlic and parmesan.

MainCourse.alt: A gourmet veggie pizza topped with spinach, mozzarella, and artichokes
MainCourse.name: Veggie Paradise Pizza
MainCourse.description: Thin-crust pizza topped with fresh spinach, mozzarella, and artichokes for a delightful bite.

MainCourse.alt: A bowl of seafood fried rice with jasmine rice, seafood, and fresh vegetables
MainCourse.name: Ocean's Bounty Rice
MainCourse.description: A fragrant blend of jasmine rice, succulent seafood, and fresh vegetables.

Desserts.alt: A molten lava chocolate cake with a crispy exterior and gooey center
Desserts.name: Molten Lava Cake
Desserts.description: A rich and gooey chocolate cake with a crispy exterior and molten center.

Desserts.alt: A stack of fruit and berry pancakes topped with fresh figs, strawberries, and blueberries
Desserts.name: Berry Good Pancakes
Desserts.description: Delicious pancakes served with fresh figs, strawberries, and blueberries for a refreshing treat.

Desserts.alt: A citrus tart garnished with blackberries and orange slices
Desserts.name: Zesty Citrus Tart
Desserts.description: A tangy lemon tart garnished with fresh blackberries and orange slices, offering a burst of flavor.

Drinks.alt: A creamy floral drink topped with a red rose
Drinks.name: Floral Dream
Drinks.description: A creamy and delicate drink topped with a red rose.

Drinks.alt: A glass of mint soda with crushed ice
Drinks.name: Minty Breeze
Drinks.description: A cool mint-infused soda with crushed ice for ultimate refreshment.

Drinks.name: Watermelon Lime Cooler
Drinks.description: A tangy and sweet watermelon drink with a touch of lime.
